system:
note description: "[ Perform arithmetic (+, -, *, /) on real numbers of arbitrary precision. In the case of division, the default precision is 35 digits after the decimal point. This can be changed via ../mathmodels/value.xml#f_set_division_precisionset_division_precision. The queries ../mathmodels/value.xml#f_is_integeris_integer, ../mathmodels/value.xml#f_is_naturalis_natural and ../mathmodels/value.xml#f_is_natural1is_natural1 may be used to check that the value is an integer or natural number. ../mathmodels/value.xml#f_outout provides a string represesentation rounded to two decimal places, and ../mathmodels/value.xml#f_precise_outprecise_out is a string representation of the precise value. The corresponding C# class was the inspiration for this class. ]" author: "Vlad Gerchikov for the Software Engineering Lab at mailto:sel@cse.yorku.ca"sel@cse.yorku.ca" date: "$April 15, 2008$" revision: "$1.0$"
